There has been much controversy on this subject. SSRI stands for selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor.
 
 Prozac is one of the many.
 
 The use of these drugs to treat depression has been debated now for a while but the american medical association continues the support.
 
 Has anyone had experience, good or bad and what do you think?
